accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Privately printed for The Rockefeller Institute for Medical Research General Education Board, The Rockefeller Foundation, New York: 1937.
A memorial prepared at the time of John D. Rockefeller's death regarding his various benefactions with copies and translations of messages of sympathy from all over the world.
One copy is hand printed and especially bound; second copy for the record.
Package contains an etching of John D. Rockefeller done by Timothy Cole. This is the portrait used in the Memorial volume.
